snippet.title: Blood Bowl: Chaos Edition
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/216890/
More info on : http://bloodbowl-game.com/

Blood Bowl: Chaos Edition is the latest edition of the video game adaptation of Games Workshop's famous board game. As an ultra-violent yet tactical team sport inspired by the universe of Warhammer, Blood Bowl lets players recruit a team of Orcs, Elves, Humans, Vampires, Ogres, Dwarves, and many other fantasy creatures who will throw themselves into the bloodiest of all arenas!
In the Chaos Edition, three new races make a triumphant arrival on the field, for a total of 23 playable races: The malevolent and much-anticipated Chaos Dwarves, the outcasts of the Underworld teams and, for the very first time in the history of Blood Bowl, the Daemons of Khorne, hailing all the way from the Chaos realms! An exclusive and brand new stadium, recently erected by Amazons and Lizardmen, is more than ready to welcome all new teams seeking to win the Blood Bowl! World Championship mode expands even further the solo experience of Blood Bowl. From national qualifications and continental cups to the fi nal tournament, the competition just got bloodier! The much-appreciated online mode will of course be available with its intense matches, vicious private leagues, and global rankings!

- 23 races total, including 3 new ones, all diverse in appearance and gameplay.
- 10 arenas with varied ambiance and style, including the new stadium of the Amazon and Lizardmen!

New World Championship mode: create your team and lead it to victory!

Create your own online league, challenge other players, and climb up the global rankings!
